changeSet.author: pompei
changeSet.sql: create table customer ( person_id varchar not null primary key, name varchar(100) not null )

changeSet.author: pompei
changeSet.sql: create table item ( item_id serial primary key, category varchar(100) default 'menu1', description text, image text default 'https://thumb.chocofood.kz/J1YGSDPCTtJNmA7iQCADLSU5fqM=/fit-in/400x0/https://chocofood.kz/media/site/restaurants/food/logo/2019/05/14/food_FQJ4MvW.png', name varchar(100), price decimal )

changeSet.author: pompei
changeSet.sql: create table oorder ( oorder_id serial primary key, oorder_no varchar(100), person_id varchar(100), p_method varchar(100), g_total decimal, booking_id int, foreign key(person_id) references person(id) )

changeSet.author: pompei
changeSet.sql: create table order_items ( order_item_id serial not null primary key, oorder_id bigint, item_id int, quantity int, foreign key(oorder_id) references oorder(oorder_id), foreign key(item_id) references item(item_id) )
